name: Ionix
description:
This is just a little prototype for a game. As you can tell it was heavily inspired by the game Downwell. There are some problems with the game, thats because I was just hacking in things for fun.

Anyways, the idea of the game is

  • Change your ship
  • Upgrade ship (press esc)
  • Go as long as possible in the procedural levels
  • Equip better weapons along the run

The Effects button is suppose to simulate the game on a CRT monitor...

Also you can use the XBOX 360 controller...
